abstract: Carl C. Icahn, who owns 82 percent of CVR Energy, said on Tuesday that he was dropping an offer to take the Texas refiner private, citing changing market conditions.
snippet: Carl C. Icahn, who owns 82 percent of CVR Energy, said on Tuesday that he was dropping an offer to take the Texas refiner private, citing changing market conditions.
lead_paragraph: Carl C. Icahn, who owns 82 percent of CVR Energy, said on Tuesday that he was dropping an offer to take the Texas refiner private, citing changing market conditions.

headline.main: Icahn Withdraws Offer to Take Refining Company Private
